TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Nakahila, title = Nakahila, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nakahila} }

S.FORM: Nakahila Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Nakahila a niyaro', 55 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 211 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 195 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 16 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 84%, Amis 2%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%, Seediq 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Nakahila Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Nakahila a niyaro', 55 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 211 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 195 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 16 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 84%, Amis 2%, Tayal 1%, Troko 1%, Seediq 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
